original: Nahetuṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
Nahetuṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
